timeline.message:
[JBPM-9223] include case file

Adding new "withData" flag to CaseAdminResource.getCaseInstances. When
this flag is true, caseFile information will be include in the response

timeline.author: afalhambra
afalhambra

timeline.bodyText: This change is not really needed, isn't it?
timeline.author: afalhambra

replies.bodyText: no, this is not needed, rolling back to previous one
replies.author: fjtirado

timeline.bodyText: Maybe it would good to add another test in this class for calling the new overloaded method getCaseInstancesOwnedBy
timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.bodyText: I think it would be good to add a test method here for calling method getCaseInstances for calling the underling new overloaded method getCaseInstancesAnyRole withData=true
timeline.author: afalhambra
